34 template <typename, typename>
35 class DistArray;
36 class DensePolicy;
37 class SparsePolicy;
38 
40 
45 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
46 inline std::enable_if_t<is_dense_v<Policy>, void> truncate(
47  DistArray<Tile, Policy>& array) {}
48 
50 
54 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
55 inline std::enable_if_t<!is_dense_v<Policy>, void> truncate(
56  DistArray<Tile, Policy>& array) {
57  typedef typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::value_type value_type;
58  array = foreach (
59  array,
60  [](value_type & result_tile, const value_type& arg_tile) ->
61  typename Policy::shape_type::value_type {
62  using result_type = typename Policy::shape_type::value_type;
63  result_type arg_tile_norm;
64  norm(arg_tile, arg_tile_norm);
65  result_tile = arg_tile; // Assume this is shallow copy
66  return arg_tile_norm;
67  });
68 }
69 
70 } // namespace TiledArray
71 
72 #endif // TILEDARRAY_CONVERSIONS_TRUNCATE_H__INCLUDED
